summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing the acceptance of vendor fees for participation in the Seattle Aquarium Second Annual Salmon Homecoming Celebration, and donations and contributions made in support of this event; increasing the expenditure allowance of the Department's 1994 budget; authorizing and ratifying certain expenditures; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park Fund; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
